name: args
description: Send custom arguments for running ZAP (override other parameters)

name: port
description: The port used by ZAP for running the local proxy

name: apikey
description: Setup a custom API key for ZAP, if not provided JaguarScan will generate one for you

name: path
description: Custom path for locating the zap.bat or zap.sh script, if not provided the module will use the default based on the current OS

name: scantype
description: What scan type do you want ZAP to run: spider,active,full

name: memory
description: You can specify how much memory Zap will use (512 default)

name: max_minutes
description: Maximum minutes allowed for the scan to run

name: timeout
description: Abort the scan if the progress is stuck for 30 minutes

name: daemon_mode
description: Run Zap in daemon mode (no GUI)

name: rules_quality
description: Define the quality of rules to be used

name: severity_level
description: Define minimum severity to be reported

name: confidence_level
description: Define minimum confidence level to be reported
